data.title: Why is my narcissist husband always so angry at me?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 15): That’s just the way narcs operate. They don’t know how to be happy to save themselves. They talk AT YOU not with you. I asked my ex narc why was he angry all the time and he told me THAT’S JUST THE WAY I AM get over it. I found out later that it is a line narcs use. The anger is...
